statements: UPDATE packaging_materials SET carbon_footprint = 3.5, recyclability_rating = 4 WHERE material_id = 1;
UPDATE packaging_materials SET material_name = 'Plastic', recyclability_rating = 3 WHERE material_id = 2;
UPDATE packaging_materials SET carbon_footprint = 3.5, recyclability_rating = 4 WHERE material_id = 1;
UPDATE packaging_materials SET material_name = 'Biodegradable Plastic', carbon_footprint = 2.7 WHERE recyclability_rating > 3;
UPDATE packaging_materials SET sustainability_score = 4.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE material_metrics SET recyclable = true, biodegradable = false WHERE material_id = 2;
UPDATE packaging_materials SET sustainability_score = 4.5 WHERE material_name = 'Cardboard';
UPDATE material_metrics SET recyclable = true, biodegradable = false, weight = 0.75 WHERE material_id = 2;
UPDATE packaging_materials SET sustainability_score = 4.2 WHERE material_id = 1;
UPDATE material_properties SET property_description = 'Recyclable material' WHERE property_id = 2;
UPDATE packaging_materials SET sustainability_score = 9.5, material_name = 'Eco-Friendly Packaging' WHERE material_id = 1;
UPDATE material_metrics SET metric_value = 8.2 WHERE metric_name = 'Recyclability';
UPDATE packaging_materials SET sustainability_rating = 3 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE packaging_metrics SET value = 0.5 WHERE packaging_id = 2;
UPDATE packaging_materials SET material_name = 'Eco-Friendly Paper' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE packaging_metrics SET value = 0.75, packaging_material_id = 2 WHERE metric_id = 1;
UPDATE PackagingMaterial SET recyclable = TRUE WHERE material_id = 1;
UPDATE MaterialMetrics SET weight = 3.50, thickness = 0.25 WHERE material_id = 2;
UPDATE PackagingMaterial SET material_name = 'Eco-Friendly Paper', recyclable = TRUE WHERE material_id = 1;
UPDATE Supplier SET location = 'New York City', supplier_name = 'Green Supplier' WHERE supplier_id = 2;
